text: Francis Xavier McCarthy (born February 15, 1942) is an American actor who has appeared in movies such as The Man with Two Brains (1983), Summer School (1987), Deep Impact (1998), BASEketball (1998) and Interstellar (2014) and several television shows such as CSI: NY, Frasier, Cheers, 9-1-1, Smallville, Port Charles, 21 Jump Street, Bates Motel, Supernatural and NCIS. ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors
title: Francis Xavier McCarthy
